control_attributes.Control: SC-7 (16) PREVENT DISCOVERY OF COMPONENTS / DEVICES
control_attributes.control_description: The information system prevents discovery of specific system components composing a managed interface.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system implements separate network addresses (i.e., different subnets) to connect to systems in different security domains.

Control Statement: The information system prevents discovery of specific system components composing a managed interface.
